channel.title: MiniGame help
channel.description:
Hi guys i used a guide to make my self a Bandos and Armadyl MiniGame and they both work fine. But i wanna edit them but i dont realy know how to do it :(
At the momoent wen i type ::bandosmini it takes me to the duel arena i kill the first dragon then the next and so on and wen ive killed the last dragon i get a set of bandos + the godsword well i want to change that so after ive killed all the dragons there is a final dragon wich wen i kill he drops a key and i put that key in a chest and it gives random parts of bandos. < i used bandos for an example
I hope someone can make a TUT on how to do this or help me with this :rolleyes:

item.title: MiniGame help
item.dc:creator: @ben123249 ben123249
item.description:
@ben123249 wrote:

Hi guys i used a guide to make my self a Bandos and Armadyl MiniGame and they both work fine. But i wanna edit them but i dont realy know how to do it

At the momoent wen i type ::bandosmini it takes me to the duel arena i kill the first dragon then the next and so on and wen ive killed the last dragon i get a set of bandos + the godsword well i want to change that so after ive killed all the dragons there is a final dragon wich wen i kill he drops a key and i put that key in a chest and it gives random parts of bandos. < i used bandos for an example

I hope someone can make a TUT on how to do this or help me with this :rolleyes:
